metadata.name: Blackjack Dealer
metadata.description:
[h1] Time to fuel your gambling addiction with the Blackjack Dealer mod! [/h1]
This mod adds a blackjack dealer beggar to [b]arcade rooms[/b].
The default spawn chance is 50% (although you can use [b]Mod Config Menu[/b] to change it) to replace any machine, beggar or shell game in an arcade room.
To play blackjack - you simply walk up to him. One game costs [b]5 cents[/b]. If you win, you get your coins back on top of the reward.
[b]How to play blackjack? Check the Discussions or [url=https://www.blackjackapprenticeship.com/how-to-play-blackjack/] look it up. [/url][/b]
[b]Controls:[/b] [list] [*]Shoot left/right - Change the arrow to go hit/stand [*]Bomb - Trigger the action selected by the arrow [*]Drop - Leave the menu [/list] [b]Payouts:[/b] [list] [*]40% - 1 "Special" card which is basically just a playing card. [*]20% - 2 Random cards [*]15% - 1 Lucky penny & 2 normal pennies [*]10% - 2 Keys & 2 bombs [*]5% - 1 Dime [*]4% - 1 Random item from the claw machine item pool [*]3% - 1 Chest [*]2% - 1 Random Trinket [*]1% - Destruction of the beggar [/list]
The beggar/dealer npc's type is 6 and the variant is 72, so you can spawn it with [code] spawn 6.72 [/code]
[b]Possible future additions:[/b] Increase the max amount of cards, so that they don't get off the paper after more than 7 cards
[b] Bug notice: [/b] Sometimes when the player/dealer hits the card isn't added but the sound plays. Also sometimes the dealer's hidden card isn't shown. I have no clue what causes these bugs, however [b]I believe they're completely harmless and don't substancially affect gameplay[b].
Thanks to Discowy 2.0 for the help with sprites and balancing.
You can check this mod's github repo [url=https://github.com/ddeeddii/tboi_blackjack_dealer] here [/url]
